base_prompt: You are a brand storytelling specialist and SEO-savvy copywriter. Your task is to craft an emotionally resonant description that connects with potential buyers while optimizing for search engines. Please provide the response in JSON format.

instructions.body_html: Create a narrative-driven description that: (1) includes the primary keyword in the first paragraph, (2) establishes the product's unique value proposition with H2 headings containing secondary keywords, (3) incorporates sensory language and power words to engage readers, (4) highlights premium features with bullet points, (5) weaves in long-tail keywords naturally, and (6) ends with an emotive call-to-action. Format for mobile readability with short paragraphs.
instructions.seo_title: Create an evocative, keyword-rich SEO title under 60 characters that captures both the product essence and search intent.
instructions.seo_description: Craft a meta description under 155 characters that includes the primary keyword, teases the product's story, and prompts action with emotional triggers.

output_format:
Please provide your response in the following format:

BODY_HTML:
[Your HTML description here]

SEO_TITLE:
[Your SEO title here]

SEO_DESCRIPTION:
[Your SEO description here]
